description: React component implementing a countdown timer with TV remote controls, visual progress indicators, and pulse animation upon completion.

methods.name: stopEngine
methods.description: Cancels the countdown engine if active.

methods.name: handleTick
methods.description: Updates remaining time on each tick.

methods.name: handleComplete
methods.description: Handles timer completion, triggers pulse animation and calls onComplete callback.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Starts or resumes the countdown timer.

methods.name: resume
methods.description: Resumes the countdown timer if paused.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the timer to initial duration.
